title: Watering System
description: Automatic watering system application to set a watering schedule via a web page served directly from an IntelÂ® Edison system. Automatically checks the moisture sensor data at periodic intervals. If the water pump is enabled, but the water flow sensor does not detect flowing water, a text message can be sent via Twilio* as a repair alert. Optionally, you can also log watering system events using the Intel IoT Examples Datastore running in your Microsoft* Azure* account.
